Package edu.brown.cs.student.main.SearchUtility

Class Search

java.lang.Object
edu.brown.cs.student.main.SearchUtility.Search
public class Search extends Object
Class used to search a CSV file parsed using the CSVParser class.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Search(String fileName, Boolean headersPresent)
    Constructs a Search object using the specified file name to create a CSVParser.

  • Constructor Details

    • Search

      public Search(String fileName, Boolean headersPresent) throws FileNotFoundException, AccessDeniedException
      Constructs a Search object using the specified file name to create a CSVParser.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file to be searched.
      headersPresent - A boolean indicating whether the CSV file has headers.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the specified CSV file is not found.
      AccessDeniedException - If there is an attempt to access a file outside the 'data' directory.

  • Method Details

    • parseCSV

      public void parseCSV() throws IOException, FactoryFailureException, MalformedRowsException
      Parses CSV stored in CSVParser field
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while parsing the CSV file.
      FactoryFailureException - if an error occurs during CSVParser creation of List object from row.
      MalformedRowsException - if parser encounters rows of invalid size while parsing

    • searchCSV

      public List<List<String>> searchCSV(String toSearch)
      Searches the CSV file for rows containing specified value. The specified value must be a substring of one of the values in a row to be considered a 'match'.
      Parameters:
      toSearch - The value to search for in the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of rows that contain the specified value. If no matches are found, an empty list will be returned.

    • searchCSV

      public List<List<String>> searchCSV(String toSearch, String header) throws NoSuchElementException
      Searches the CSV file for rows containing the specified value in a specific header/column. The specified value must be a substring the value in the specified column of a row to be considered a 'match'.
      Parameters:
      toSearch - The value to search for in the CSV file.
      header - The header/column in which to search for the value.
      Returns:
      A list of rows that contain the specified value in the specified header/column. If no matches are found, an empty list will be returned.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the specified header does not exist in the CSV file.

    • searchCSV

      public List<List<String>> searchCSV(String toSearch, Integer columnNumber) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Searches the CSV file for rows containing the specified value in a specific column. The specified value must be a substring the value in the specified column of a row to be considered a 'match'.
      Parameters:
      toSearch - The value to search for in the CSV file.
      columnNumber - The column number in which to search for the value.
      Returns:
      A list of rows that contain the specified value in the specified column. If no matches are found, an empty list will be returned.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the specified column number is out of bounds.
